product_name: Bending Branches Expedition Plus Canoe Paddle
long_description: This wood straight-shaft canoe paddle is ideal for long wilderness tripping or light whitewater use . Wood is unmatched for balance, feel and performance, and it's comfortable in your hands regardless of the temperature. Wrap Around(TM) Rockgard(R) impact-resistant resin is molded into the paddle tip and up the edges, extending the life of the paddle. Powerful, efficient nine-laminate blade features butternut and basswood that's extremely durable. Ultimate T-Grip(TM) is a soft, rounded T-Grip offering exceptional comfort and control for long-distance paddling.
short_description: This wood straight-shaft canoe paddle is ideal for long wilderness tripping or light whitewater use .
